sources.note: Main site: lists 6 modules (EMR, PMS, Patient Portal, Order Entry, e-Billing, Mobile). Emphasizes low cost, SaaS model, no IT staff needed.
ONC certification page with CHPL number, certified criteria list, links to Real World Test Plans, EHI export docs, and API documentation.
Products page: describes PMS features (scheduling, registration, message manager, referral management, BI reports), EMR, Patient Portal, Order Entry, Billing, Mobile, and Transcription Services.
Services page: describes transcription services (4-phase QA, 24hr turnaround), scheduling, and billing services with links to detailed billing pages.
e-Billing page: charge capture, claim scrubbing, electronic submission to 2500+ payers, payment posting, denial tracking, EOB/ERA processing, patient statements.
Billing services page: full outsourcing RCM option including data entry, electronic submission, credentialing, coding monitoring, tax/payroll services.
Security page: HIPAA compliance, audit trails, user-based permissions, mentions SQL Server 2005 and HL7 compliance.
About page: founded by physicians and business professionals, mission to be trusted source for integrated clinical practice management.
Live EHR login page for Radysans EHR 5.0. Shows Drummond certification badge, patient/provider/representative login options, API registration, FHIR data types listed.
Mann ENT patient portal running Radysans EHR v3.0. Confirms ENT practice in NC as customer. Multi-tenant design requiring practice code.
BBB profile: incorporated 11/18/1999, categorized as medical billing, Raj Polavaram as President, not BBB accredited, no reviews or complaints.
Alignable listing: describes product as 'Integrated Health Records Software and RCM Services for outpatient clinics'. Contact: Shekar Raju.
ZoomInfo page (403 - could not access full content). Listed as healthcare software company.
Mann ENT practice website (Cary/Clayton, NC). Dr. Charles H. Mann is on Radysans Senior Advisory Council. ENT practice using Radysans EHR.
